name: Visual Studio J# Project
summary: Learn about .VJSPROJ files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: The VJSPROJ file is one of several project files created by Visual Studio. The .CSPROJ file is used to store a C# project and the .VBPROJ file is used to store a Visual Basic project.
Visual J# is a programming language developed as a transitional language for Java and Visual J++ programmers working on .NET Framework applications.
NOTE: Visual J# is now retired and Visual Studio support for the programming language ended in 2015.
